Version 2.0.80 - Fix Position Bar Showing Furthest Instead of Current Slide

Bug Fixes

  • Position bar now shows correct current slide instead of always showing furthest
  • SmartLearning API polling reads real cs=current from DB instead of boosted cs=furthest
  • Going back and forth between slides now updates position bar immediately

Changes

  • Stop boosting suspend_data.cs during normal navigation writes (LMSSetValue)
  • Remove suspend_data.cs boost from post-intercept timeouts (tag and non-tag)
  • Keep score.raw and lesson_location boosts for progress tracking and resume
  • Resume correctness handled by pre-init backing store and read interceptors at page load
  • Same changes applied for both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004 handlers

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.79: Fix DOM observer picking up post-intercept boosted values as navigation
  • v2.0.78: Fix re-entrant LMSSetValue processing modified suspend_data as navigation
  • v2.0.77: Fix position bar jumping to furthest (poll reading boosted lesson_location from DB)
